name: Alchemist Simulator
detailed_description:
Manage hundreds of combinations to create various potions balancing their positive and negative effects. There are many ways to transmute your resources ranging from simple grinding all the way to magical essence cleansing, but some of them can be tricky or even dangerous.


You will have a choice to accept contracts ranging from making a simple poison to an elaborate Potion of Midas Touch (but you better not drink it). Watch out as each action will have a consequence for the world around you and you never know what will happen if you send the wrong potion.


Purchase and process a variety of alchemical ingredients to uncover their inner aspects. Be careful though as some of them require special attention or the results can be unpredictable.


Learn new recipes and ingredient qualities as quest rewards or through experimenting. The world is full of undiscovered recipes, will you be able to find them all and not explode in the process?


Spend the money you earn on upgrades for your lab preparing it for more advanced alchemical challenges.

short_description: Become the mystical alchemist, choose your contracts wisely as they will shape the world around you, discover the long forgotten magical recipes, upgrade your lab and become the most powerful alchemist of all times.
